Class lightLeft

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • lightLeft
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class lightLeft
extends java.lang.Thread
    This class controls the right light sensor, it runs on its own dedicated thread
    Author:
    Ege Ozer
